title: Angry Birds maker Rovio's third-quarter profit halves year-on-year
text:
Angry Birds maker Rovio's third-quarter profit halves year-on-year

Tech 27 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 03:30)

© Reuters. Angry Birds maker Rovio's third-quarter profit halves year-on-year HELSINKI (Reuters) - Rovio Entertainment, the maker of the 10-year-old "Angry Birds" mobile game series, reported on Wednesday a 48% drop in its quarterly profit year-on-year, due to higher costs to obtain new players. The Finnish company, which listed its shares last year and cut its 2019 outlook on higher investment costs last month, said its third-quarter operating profit was 5.4 million euros ($6.00 million), while sales grew 5.4% on year to 74.8 million euros.

Angry Birds maker Rovio's third-quarter profit halves year-on-year
description: Angry Birds maker Rovio's third-quarter profit halves year-on-year
